game.path: ./You Died But a Necromancer Revived You.sh
game.name: You Died But a Necromancer Revived You
game.desc: You Died ... but a Necromancer revived you! And will keep bringing you back to their crazy tower of death until you reach the top floor and get rid of them, allowing you to finally be free... Can you stop this madness? Or will you give up? Reaching the top is no easy feat!
